articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS -- Everything head coach Juwan Howard and Michigan said during Friday's press conference, before the 11th-seeded Wolverines face No. 3-seed Tennessee
articles.content:
Q. Juwan, seems like DeVanté Jones is ready to come back, is that true and will he go into the starting lineup?
COACH HOWARD: DeVanté was out there for more than practice, got out there, got a littl… [+1263 chars]

articles.author: Michael C. Wright
articles.title: Kia MVP Ladder: Luka Doncic storms back into top 5 - NBA.com
articles.description: A string of clutch passes lifts Luka Doncic back into the mix in our latest review of the award's top contenders.
articles.content:
In addition to the timely game-winning dime, Luka Doncic scored 37 points against the Nets.
The Kia MVP Ladder is published every Friday during the season with an in-depth look at the top Kia MVP ca… [+8753 chars]
